attributes.action: Not To Sign Over Our Military Or Our Nuclear Into The EU Military.
attributes.additional_details: REGARDLESS, THEY WILL BE SENT ABROAD TO FOREIGN SHORES TO WARS NOT OF OUR MAKING OR CHOOSING FOR THE CORRUPT GREEDY ELITE, TO MAKE MASS FORTUNES AT THE EXPENSE OF THE BLOOD OF OUR CHILDREN AND OTHER NATIONS CHILDREN. WE SHOULD BE ABLE TO HAVE A RIGHT TO OUR OWN DEFENSE EVEN FROM POTENTIAL ALLIES WHICH CAN CHANGE BECOME TYRANNICAL AS WELL. THAT'S WHY EVERY NATION, ALL THE WAY DOWN TO THE INDIVIDUAL PERSON HAS THE RIGHT TO TAKE WHAT DEFENSIVE MEASURES TO PROTECT THEMSELVES.
attributes.background: (1) IT WILL LEAVE THE UK DEFENCELESS, (2) ALL OUR CHILDREN UPON REACHING AGE WILL BE CONSCRIPTED INTO THE EU, (3) WE ARE MENT TO BE LEAVING THE EU SO WE NEED OUR OWN DEFENSIVE SAFE GAURDS AGAINST ANY FUTURE TYRANNICAL RULE (which it seems the EU is already under a tyrannical unelected ruling power).
